query:
SELECT p.id, p.userId, p.firstName, p.lastName, p.email, u.email as userEmail, u.openId, u.role 
FROM participants p 
LEFT JOIN users u ON p.userId = u.id 
WHERE u.email = 's.sachs@sachs-media.com' OR u.openId = 's.sachs@sachs-media.com'
LIMIT 5;
command:
